content: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on this topic. To sum up, you believe that focusing on the process rather than the outcome can help individuals achieve a balance between having a sense of purpose and being open to new opportunities by allowing them to enjoy the process and not to miss other options. And that this approach has helped you in your life by choosing to focus on certain process and not the outcome and enjoy the process, like taking care of a cactus without the goal of making him big. Is there anything else you would like to add?
